item.title: Graduate Research Student Toolkit
item.description: Graduate Research Life The Research Checklist Writing Project Management Project Updates Note-taking Referencing Statistics Coding Social Media Other Useful Tools An unusually composed graduate student Graduate Research Life If you’ve stubled onto this page, chances are that you’ve recently embarked on your graduate research programme or are somewhere along in your research studies! For this, I applaud your ambition and zeal! Which you fell for…

item.title: About
item.description: This is a “hello world” example website for the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.
